page.title: 19AN ENTERTAINER
page.content: {Jimmy Shand}was born in{East Wemyss on the{28th}of{January, 1908.}He has lived in{Auchtermuchty}for over{27} years. He began his working life in the mines. He has been playing the accordion since he was five and began making records in{1933.}After the war he turned professional. He has made hundreds of records and tapes and has been awarded silver and gold discs.{ { Jimmy Shand}has lost count of how many dances he has played at. He has toured{America, Canada, Australia, {New Zealand}and{Germany}and has met many famous personalities. He has also played for royalty at{Balmoral {Castle}and{Windsor Castle.}In 1962 he went to{Buckingham Palace}and received the{M.B.E. Jimmy Shand}likes pop music if it is played quietly. His own favourite song is{'My Ain Folk'}.
